com.capgemini.cobigen.impl.config

Class ConfigurationHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.capgemini.cobigen.impl.config.ConfigurationHolder

  • public class ConfigurationHolder
extends Object
    Cached in-memory CobiGen configuration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigurationHolder(Path configurationPath)
      Creates a new ConfigurationHolder which serves as a cache for CobiGen's external configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContextConfiguration readContextConfiguration()
      Reads the ContextConfiguration from cache or from file if not present in cache.
      TemplatesConfiguration readTemplatesConfiguration(Trigger trigger)
      Reads the TemplatesConfiguration from cache or from file if not present in cache.

    • Method Detail

      • readTemplatesConfiguration

        public TemplatesConfiguration readTemplatesConfiguration(Trigger trigger)
        Reads the TemplatesConfiguration from cache or from file if not present in cache.
        Parameters:
        trigger - to get matcher declarations from
        Returns:
        the TemplatesConfiguration
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - if the configuration is not valid

      • readContextConfiguration

        public ContextConfiguration readContextConfiguration()
        Reads the ContextConfiguration from cache or from file if not present in cache.

        the ContextConfiguration
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - if the configuration is not valid
